content.prompt: The author introduces her essay by relating an anecdote from her vacation in France (paragraphs 1 and 2) primarily to

choices.label: praise the widespread custom of European napping
confirm her audienceâ€™s suspicion that napping is inefficient
offer advice to Americans traveling in rural France
establish a cultural comparison for her argument about napping

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
